desc: Our cozy single rooms provide a comfortable and affordable accommodation option for solo travelers. Each room is equipped with essential amenities to ensure a pleasant stay

A double room is a type of accommodation designed for two people with a double-sized bed and various amenities, commonly preferred by couples or friends traveling together. These rooms are available in hotels or rental apartments, and offer a comfortable and affordable option for those seeking a shared space.

Triple rooms in hotels are designed for three people and offer a comfortable and affordable option for those seeking shared accommodation. They typically feature a double bed and an extra single bed, along with essential amenities like an en-suite bathroom, entertainment options, desk space, and wardrobe storage.
